name: @certusone/wormhole-sdk-wasm
description: WebAssembly libraries for interacting with Wormhole

scripts.build-deps: cd ../.. && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build -f solana/Dockerfile.wasm -o type=local,dest=. solana
scripts.build-lib: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && node scripts/copyWasm.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build-deps && npm run build-lib

author: certusone
